name: Bow Hunter 2017 East
description:
Bow Hunter 2017 East is White Tail deer hunting in the American East, with Treestand and Stalking Hunts. Players need to learn how to shoot, to track, and to use camouflage, to pick the right bows and right arrows, to take down bigger and bigger White Tail deer. Each Hunt will win the player in game Obucks and Gold, with specific Cash Hunts to help grow the players in game bank account. Regular Tournaments are also help for bigger prizes including Real Cash, Gift Cards to your favorite retailer, and in game Gold.

Deer behavior, camouflage effectiveness, arrow range, and ballistics are all updated and improved in Bow Hunter 2017 East’s over 100 different hunt opportunities. While Bow Hunter 2017 East has the same landscapes as Bow Hunter 2016, the hunts will be more realistic and challenging!

And now full Cash Tournaments will be possible with anti-hack testing so all players have a chance to win cash prizes!

Look for the next simulation in the Bow Hunter series with the American Northwest and Southwest landscapes and animals in Bow Hunter 2017 West.
